Who is Anna Faris Husband Ben Indra? Wiki and Bio

Ben Indra was born on 23 February 1979, in Sonoma County, California, USA, which means that he is 40 years old, his zodiac sign is Pisces, and nationality American. He is an actor, who has worked on projects such as âRaising Dadâ and âLovers Laneâ, but is perhaps better known as the ex-husband of actress Anna Faris.

Net Worth

So just how rich is Ben Indra as of early 2019? According to authoritative sources, this actor has a net worth of over $3 million, accumulated from his career in the previously mentioned field. He hasnât revealed any information regarding his assets such as houses and cars, nor has he spoken about his annual income, probably because it varies depending on how active he is in work, but he is seemingly able to take care of himself financially.

Ethnicity and Background

Speaking about Indraâs ethnicity, he is Caucasian, and has brown hair and brown eyes. Judging from the photos available on the internet, Ben has a fit figure and looks well put together at events he attends. Unfortunately, he hasnât shared any information about his early life and formative years.

Career

Indra made his acting debut in 1999 with a small role in âUndressedâ, and followed in the same year by working on âLovers Laneâ, in which he played Bradley. In 2000, the actor worked on âVoodoo Academyâ, alongside actors such as Debra Mayer, Riley Smith, Chad Burris and Kevin Calisher, and having a lot on his plate, on several more projects too, including âTempest Eyeâ and âDamaged Goodsâ, before in 2001 joining the cast of âRaising Dadâ, which follows the story of a widowed father as he raises his two daughters, and tries to keep his professional and private life from falling apart. Having finished with that project in 2002, Indra took a three year pause from acting, ultimately landing his latest project, âLove,Inc.â in 2005. Overall, the actor has had nine acting gigs.

Ex-Wife Anna Farris

Speaking about Indraâs relationship status, he was previously married to Anna Faris, an acclaimed actress known for her work on projects such as âThe House Bunnyâ and the Scary Movie franchise. Faris and Indra had no children together, however, the actress went on to remarry and give birth to a son named Jack Pratt. Indra is pretty secretive about his relationship status, which lead many to believe that he is single as of today.

Social Media

Ben isnât active on any social media, which makes it harder for his fans to keep in touch with him. However, his ex-wife is active on Twitter and Instagram, and uses her accounts to promote her work as well as to communicate with her fans. She is followed by almost 500,000 people on Twitter â some of her latest posts include a tweet with the caption reading âYou could say todayâs episode of #Unqualified is a SMASHing hit. @AnnaKFaris and @SimSarna call London to chat with @katharinemcphee about performing in @WaitressLondon, her favorite memories from âThe House Bunnyâ, and some deal breakers!â.

Instagram

Anna is also active on Instagram, which she uses to share photos from her private life, allowing her fans to take a closer look at whatâs going on behind the scenes. She has 2.1 million followers on that social media, and some of her latest posts include a photo of herself playing guitar, with the following caption âMy plan B â taking my one man band on the road- one tin solider rides alone- but not without everyone I loveâ. She has also shared a photo of herself in a stunning gray dress, which her fans seem to have loved, as they have complimented her looks and left numerous sweet messages.

Anna Faris Career

Faris made her debut in the acting world in 1991, when she played Liz in âDeception: A Motherâs Secretâ, and followed by working on âScary Movieâ in 2000, which parodied âScreamâ, a cult horror movie. In the following year, Farris worked on the sequel of âScary Movieâ, collaborating with actors such as Antony Acker, Mark Barrett, Richard Bellos, Suzanne Bianqui and Natalie Bosco. Being both a hardworking and talented woman, Faris continued on with projects such as âFriendsâ, âBrokeback Mountainâ, âThe House Bunnyâ and âJust Friendsâ. Speaking about her latest projects, those include âMomâ, in which she played the role of Christy in its 128 episodes, and which follows the story of a newly sober single mom who moves to the Napa Valley, and received generally positive response from critics and the audience. Overall, Anna has had 50 acting gigs, which has allowed her to make a name for herself, as well as to gain more attention and exposure in the media.
